name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Security Engineer with over 10 years of experience in cloud security and SOC operations, skilled in threat hunting and incident management. Proficient in security tools and technologies including **AWS**, **Azure**, **Sentinel**, **Splunk**, and **Rapid7**. Strong understanding of security fundamentals and frameworks (SIEM, EDR, DLP, CSPM). Experienced in scripting with **Python** and **PowerShell** to automate security processes. Proven ability to deliver effective security solutions and contribute to collaborative projects within top-tier organizations, such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Adept at communicating complex security concepts to diverse audiences and fostering team collaboration.
